resources.string: Find 3 same multipliers! You have 5 attempts
7 Fruits Line! The rules of the game are simple. In front of you are 30 cards. You have to find all same cards on the time.
The game contains 3 difficulties - Low, Medium and Hard. The differences between them in amount of time that you have to find all pairs. And also - higher difficulty means higher reward.

You can also try your luck and play lottery after you won. You will have 9 cards in front of you. You have total of 5 attempts to find 3 same multipliers. If you found them - you reward multiplies by this amount. But be careful, if you will not find them - you lose your reward
